summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Brentwood Beach; Brooklyn Addition; Section 8, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; University Lake Shore Addition; Loch-Gilvra Addition; John J. McGilvra's Second Addition; Bell and Denny's First Addition; Bell and Denny's First Addition; Greenlake Five Acre Tracts; bonnie Glen, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
